General.Name: China Resources Chemical Innovative Materials Co. Ltd.
General.Description: China Resources Chemical Innovative Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of non-fiber grade polyester pellets in China and internationally. The company offers bottle-grade PET chips under the Hualei name. Its products are used in drinking water, hot-filled beverages, carbonated beverages, edible oil, alcohol packaging, medical blood collection tubes, films, sheets, etc. The company also sells its products online. The company also provides warehousing and logistics, and other services. The company is based in Changzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Xinyu East Road, Changzhou, China, 213003
